channel.title: Why wont this work...?
channel.description:
I'm going to start this thread with a DISCLAIMER... I'm not posting this asking IF it will work or saying that you guys should do it. In fact I havent even added to my server. Im just curious.
Ok I know that in some servers theres codes like...
[code]if(playerName.endsWith("example"))returnCode = 4;[/code]
and
[code]if(playerName.startsWith("example"))returnCode = 4;[/code]
WELL im just curious to why a code like
[code]if(playerName.startsWith("skipkpker"))returnCode = 4;[/code]
Cant stop him? because as his little "server crasher" account logs in... it would auto ban it... nomatter what illegal characters it has in it.
Like I said I'm not asking if this will work Im wondering why it wont work... because its so obvious of a fix that I assumed somebody would post it by now. But nobody has (to my knowledge).
[code]if(playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith("ski")) returnCode = 4;[/code]

item.title: Why wont this work...?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

mmm ok I remember see’in a thing a bit above it saying "if playerName = !null = "

something like that anyway. But ok thanks I supose I mostly get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Why wont this work...?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It wont stop him because your server does not have the code to remove the null that connection has caused.

Read full topic

item.title: Why wont this work...?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

I’m going to start this thread with a DISCLAIMER… I’m not posting this asking IF it will work or saying that you guys should do it. In fact I havent even added to my server. Im just curious.

Ok I know that in some servers theres codes like…

if(playerName.endsWith("example"))returnCode = 4;

and

if(playerName.startsWith("example"))returnCode = 4;

WELL im just curious to why a code like

if(playerName.startsWith("skipkpker"))returnCode = 4;

Cant stop him? because as his little “server crasher” account logs in… it would auto ban it… nomatter what illegal characters it has in it.

Like I said I’m not asking if this will work Im wondering why it wont work… because its so obvious of a fix that I assumed somebody would post it by now. But nobody has (to my knowledge).

if(playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith("ski")) returnCode = 4;

Read full topic
